1220400.name: Super Kickers League: Goths and Vampires!
1220400.description:
Super Kickers League : Goths & Vampires! brings dark and spooky new content to Super Kickers League!
Use all of the new content in every game modes!

Features:
  • 2 new teams with wonderful powers : Goths & Vampires
  • 1 new map : Spooky Mansion : available by day... or night!
  • 2 new music tracks

TEAM GOTHS : Black Stripes, led by Damien Dark.

The power of Damien? He's doing Existential Void.
His power creates a black hole that attracts and slows nearby enemies!

TEAM VAMPIRES : Animal Bites, led by Elisa Crimson

The power of Elisa ? She's making the Vampiric Swarm
The Vampiric Swarm create team mascots (bats) that will harass nearby enemies!

Spooky Mansion

Discover a brand NEW map ! With spooky paintings, gargoyles, candles, this might not be the best idea to play a football game in the entrance of this mansion...
Not afraid enough? You can play on the map during the night... but be aware that ghosts might come!

Two new songs!

Spooky Mansion (Day) and Spooky Mansion (Night) got their own music. Enjoy the new beats!
1220400.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语
